examples.example: 虽然遇到了一些挫折让我有些难过，但我相信风雨过后会有彩虹。

translate.english: Although I met some setbacks which made me a little sad, I believe there will be a rainbow after the storm.

examples.example: 当我看到朋友难过时，我会尽力去安慰他，让他开心起来。

translate.english: When I see my friend is sad, I will try my best to comfort him and make him happy.

examples.example: 当我听到那个令人难过的消息时，我决定要更加珍惜现在的生活。

translate.english: When I heard that sad news, I decided to cherish the present life more.
